title: ‘We Should Have Never Raced This Final’: Vingegaard Blasts Cold-Weather Chaos at Paris-Nice
content:
Defending champion Jorgenson cedes yellow to Visma teammate in frigid, bracing cold: 'I didn’t have a good feeling at all on the final climb.'

Read the full article at ‘We Should Have Never Raced This Final’: Vingegaard Blasts Cold-Weather Chaos at Paris-Nice on Velo.
author: ahood
